main event: A 10-year-old observer reported seeing a flying saucer high overhead in Detroit, Michigan on September 29, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as resembling a falling star but was identified as a flying saucer,The saucer flew in circles and then disappeared behind a building,The sighting lasted for approximately 10 seconds,Technical data was deemed lacking for a detailed evaluation,The observer was considered unreliable due to their age.
sighted object: one flying saucer with white lights
